description: Actiontec's Wireless N USB Network Adapter leverages the power of USB 2.0 to connect at the highest speeds your network supports, up to 150 Mbps. Download files, share videos and listen to music, all at unheard of networking speeds. When paired with a wireless N router, you can get up to 10x the range of a 802.11b wireless network and eliminate wireless dead spots. Small and portable, this adapter also offers plug-and-play installation and the latest in wireless security with pushbutton WEP encryption. Its low-power design minimizes battery use for mobile devices and laptops.
title: Actiontec Wireless USB Network Adapter (Black)
